0.3.0 / 2017-06-23
==================

## New Features

* Configurable gutter widths.

## Breaking changes

None.

0.4.0 / 2018-03-13
==================

## New Features

* More alignment modifiers
* Vertically align specific cells
* Allow flex-direction: column

## Breaking changes

None.
